pages.text: The flower known as $(l:plants/sunlight_flower)Sunlight Flower$() has proven to be an incredibly curious plant. It turns out that with the help of circle magic, its essence can be transformed, shifting its allegiance from the Sun to the Moon. This results in a new species of purely magical origin - $(l:plants/moonlight_flower)Moonlight Flower$(). $(br2)$(l)Note:$() The ritual must be performed under the open sky with the Moon at its zenith.
